sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import Axios from 'axios' function Relief_Dashboard() { const [reliefdet, Setreliefdet] = useState([]); const [proddet, Setproddet] = useState([]); const [prodful, Setprodful] = useState([]); const [productsreq, SetProductsreq] = useState([]); const { state } = useLocation(); useEffect(() => { const { id } = state; console.log(id) Axios.post("http://localhost:3001/api/dashinfo", { dash: id }).then((response) => { Setreliefdet(response.data) //console.log(response.data) }) Axios.post("http://localhost:3001/api/dashmoreinfo", { dash: id }).then((response) => { Setproddet(response.data) //console.log(response.data) }) Axios.post("http://localhost:3001/api/dashfulinfo", { dash: id }).then((response) => { Setprodful(response.data) console.log(response.data) }) }, []) // const [products, Setproducts] = useState([]); // useEffect(() => { // Axios.get("http://localhost:3001/api/products").then((response) => { // Setproducts(response.data) // console.log(response) // }) // }, []) useEffect(() => { Axios.get("http://localhost:3001/api/productsifo").then((response) => { SetProductsreq(response.data) console.log(response) }) }, []) return ( <>

RELIEF PROGRAM DASHBOARD

{reliefdet.map((val) => ( ))}
Program ID Program Name Program Status Disaster Name Start Date
{val.program_id} {val.program_name} {val.program_status} {val.disaster_name} {val.start_date}

PRODUCT COMMITMENT

{reliefdet.map((val) => ( ))}
Commitment ID Organization Product Disaster Location Committed Quantity Committed Date ETD Status
{val.p_commitment_id} {val.org_name} {val.product_name} {val.location_name} {val.comm_qty} {val.comm_date} {val.exp_delivery_date} {val.status}

PRODUCT REQUIREMENT

Raise Requirment

{/*

ADD DISASTER LOCATION

*/}

{proddet.map((val) => ( ))}
Requirement ID Product Disaster Location Required Quantity Requested Date
{val.p_requirement_id} {val.product_name} {val.location_name} {val.req_qty} {val.request_date}

PRODUCT FULLFILMENT

{prodful.map((val) => ( ))}
Organization Name Product Name Committed Quantity Fulfilled Quantity Expected Delivery
{val.org_name} {val.product_name} {val.comm_qty} {val.qty_fullfilled} {val.fullfilled_date}
) } export default Relief_Dashboard
